items.address: Carrer de Joan Xicó, 1, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands
items.content: This super cute playground, shaded by beautiful trees, is right next to the castle walls. It features a few unique attractions and swings, perfect for a charming playdate.
items.summary: This super cute playground, shaded by beautiful trees, is right next to the castle walls. It features a few unique attractions and swings, perfect for a charming playdate.
items.title: Parque de Sa Capeletta - Reina Sofía

items.address: Parc de la Paz, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: Parque de la Paz isn't just a playground; it's a lovely city park with a water fountain, turtles, and a huge play area on the edge of the city center. With swings for babies and older kids and a variety of play structures. It's a fantastic spot for a family outing for all ages
items.summary: Parque de la Paz isn't just a playground; it's a lovely city park with a water fountain, turtles, and a huge play area on the edge of the city center. With swings for babies and older kids and a variety of play structures. It's a fantastic spot for a family outing for all ages
items.title: Parque de la Paz

items.address: Carrer Periodista Antoni Manel García, 2, 4, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears
items.content: This playground is a hit with kids (there is many schools in the surroundings, so there is always somebody to play with too!), featuring a zipline, a massive slide, climbing structures, swings, a cycling track, and a basketball court. With picnic tables available, it's an ideal spot for a birthday party or a family picnic.
items.summary: This playground is a hit with kids (there is many schools in the surroundings, so there is always somebody to play with too!), featuring a zipline, a massive slide, climbing structures, swings, a cycling track, and a basketball court. With picnic tables available, it's an ideal spot for a birthday party or a family picnic.
items.title: Parque de s'Illa - Can Misses

items.address: Plaça de Antoni Albert i Nieto, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears
items.content: Surrounded by restaurants, this playground is perfect for parents who want to relax while their children play. It features swings, adventurous play structures, and plenty of shade. During the winter, the square transforms into a festive wonderland; even with an ice-skating rink!
items.summary: Surrounded by restaurants, this playground is perfect for parents who want to relax while their children play. It features swings, adventurous play structures, and plenty of shade. During the winter, the square transforms into a festive wonderland; even with an ice-skating rink!
items.title: Parc infantil des Llimoners - CETIS

items.address: Carrer del País Basc, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears
items.content: Beachfront playground for the mini-kid.  With some small and simple artistic structures, such as a tunnel in the shade. Nice for young kids, but also the older ones have fun, because there is much space around it to run around and play football.
items.summary: Beachfront playground for the mini-kid.  With some small and simple artistic structures, such as a tunnel in the shade. Nice for young kids, but also the older ones have fun, because there is much space around it to run around and play football.
items.title: Parque ses Figueretas

items.address: Rio de Santa Eulària, 07840 Santa Eulària
items.content: Cute & simple playground located near the Santa Eulària river, right at the beach, with climbing structures and swings.
items.summary: Cute & simple playground located near the Santa Eulària river, right at the beach, with climbing structures and swings.
items.title: Parque Can Planetes

items.address: Carrer del Quartó de Portmany, 2, 07800 Eivissa, Illes
items.content: You like to end the day with a drink in the sunshine? This playground, with an unique green climbing structure and soft, rubberized ground, is perfect for adventurous kids. It's conveniently located right by the beach, with a variety of restaurants nearby where parents can relax and enjoy refreshments while their little ones run wild.
items.summary: You like to end the day with a drink in the sunshine? This playground, with an unique green climbing structure and soft, rubberized ground, is perfect for adventurous kids. It's conveniently located right by the beach, with a variety of restaurants nearby where parents can relax and enjoy refreshments while their little ones run wild.
items.title: Parque de infantil End of Figueretas - Prince

items.address: Avinguda Punta Arabí, Es Canar, 07849 Santa Eulària
items.content: This is a mini-amusement park by the beach! With all sorts of rides and trampolines, this place is a kid's dream. Open from May 15th to October 15th, it's the perfect spot for some summer fun. Around off season? Don't worry, there are a few simple play structures for the little ones open year-round. (really simple though)
items.summary: This is a mini-amusement park by the beach! With all sorts of rides and trampolines, this place is a kid's dream. Open from May 15th to October 15th, it's the perfect spot for some summer fun. Around off season? Don't worry, there are a few simple play structures for the little ones open year-round. (really simple though)
items.title: Parque Feria de Es Canar

items.address: Parque Infantil Cala Llonga, 07849 Cala Llonga, Balearic Islands
items.content: Sun, sand, and slides - what more could a kid want? This playground is right on the beach, making it the perfect spot for a day of fun in the sun. Cala Llonga is a wide and extensive beach, and this playground is surrounded by tons of casual eateries for when those little tummies start rumbling.
items.summary: Sun, sand, and slides - what more could a kid want? This playground is right on the beach, making it the perfect spot for a day of fun in the sun. Cala Llonga is a wide and extensive beach, and this playground is surrounded by tons of casual eateries for when those little tummies start rumbling.
items.title: Parque Infantil Cala Llonga

items.address: Carrer Venda de sa Picassa Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera
items.content: Looking for a charming playground with a local vibe? This diverse playground is right in the heart of Santa Gertrudis, making it a favorite among locals and visitors alike. And with a range of bars and restaurants just across the street, you can easily turn a playground visit into a full-day family outing. And keep an ee

And with a range of bars and restaurants just across the street, you can easily turn a playground visit into a full-day family outing. And keep an ee
items.title: Parque Santa Gertrudis - Center of the island

items.address: Caló, 70, 07829 Cala de bou, Illes Balears
items.content: Modern playground in the Cala de Bou resident area of Sant Antoni.  It's a great option for families who live nearby or are visiting the area.
items.summary: Modern playground in the Cala de Bou resident area of Sant Antoni.  It's a great option for families who live nearby or are visiting the area.
items.title: Parque Infantil Cala de Bou

items.address: Passeig de Ses Fonts, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany
items.content: Sea views and swings? Yes, please! This playground is located near the promenade, offering stunning views of the sea while your kids play. It boasts a variety of adventurous fantasy structures, and even hosts a bouncy castle festival a few times a year. Plus, there's a shaded area for parents to relax and enjoy the view.
items.summary: Sea views and swings? Yes, please! This playground is located near the promenade, offering stunning views of the sea while your kids play. It boasts a variety of adventurous fantasy structures, and even hosts a bouncy castle festival a few times a year. Plus, there's a shaded area for parents to relax and enjoy the view.
items.title: Parque Infantil de Ses Fonts

items.address: Avenida de Joan Castello, 4, 07816, Illes Balears
items.content: This green oasis of a playground is a hidden gem near Sant Rafel village center. It's cute and simple, but with a laid-back vibe that's perfect for a relaxing afternoon. Plus, there's a motocross area next to it - where older kids can burn off some extra energy on their bikes.
items.summary: This green oasis of a playground is a hidden gem near Sant Rafel village center. It's cute and simple, but with a laid-back vibe that's perfect for a relaxing afternoon. Plus, there's a motocross area next to it - where older kids can burn off some extra energy on their bikes.
items.title: Parque Infantil Josep Planells - Sant Rafel

items.address: Carrer de Federico García Lorca, 16, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears
items.content: This colorful playground has fun structures, swings, slides, and everything else kids love. It's the perfect spot for a quick play session.
items.summary: This colorful playground has fun structures, swings, slides, and everything else kids love. It's the perfect spot for a quick play session.
items.title: Parque Infantil Playa d'en Bossa

items.address: Playa Cala Vadella, Carrer Castelldefels, 5 - 7, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears
items.content: Who needs a playground when you have a bouncy castle? This cute & simple beach bar, Can Jaume, offers a playful corner for kids with an amazing bouncy castle that's open year-round. And in the summer, they even show
items.summary: Who needs a playground when you have a bouncy castle? This cute & simple beach bar, Can Jaume, offers a playful corner for kids with an amazing bouncy castle that's open year-round. And in the summer, they even show
items.title: Bouncy castle de Cala Vadella

items.address: Carrer Es Cubells 2, Es Cubells
items.content: A quaint playground in the peaceful village of Es Cubells. This is not a big one, with just a small climbing structure, slide, and a few moving objects, but it is worth mentioning. Why? Because it will allow you as parents enjoy the chillness of this village and breath taking views with a cold glass of wine on the terrace next to it.
items.summary: A quaint playground in the peaceful village of Es Cubells. This is not a big one, with just a small climbing structure, slide, and a few moving objects, but it is worth mentioning. Why? Because it will allow you as parents enjoy the chillness of this village and breath taking views with a cold glass of wine on the terrace next to it.
items.title: Parque Infantil Es Cubells

items.address: Carrer del Metge, 8, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears
items.content: This small but mighty playground in the heart of Sant Josep village may not offer much shade, but it does boast a fun climbing structure and a couple of swings, perfect for a quick play session while exploring this charming village.
items.summary: This small but mighty playground in the heart of Sant Josep village may not offer much shade, but it does boast a fun climbing structure and a couple of swings, perfect for a quick play session while exploring this charming village.
items.title: Parque Infantil Sant Josep

items.address: Carrer Marià Villangómez, 6, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Illes Balears
items.content: Get ready for an epic adventure at this massive playground – perhaps the biggest on the island! With towering slides, cool climbing frames, and swings galore, your little ones will be entertained for hours. It's so much fun with grass around it, it's a popular spot for birthday parties, with food, drinks, and endless laughter.
items.summary: Get ready for an epic adventure at this massive playground – perhaps the biggest on the island! With towering slides, cool climbing frames, and swings galore, your little ones will be entertained for hours. It's so much fun with grass around it, it's a popular spot for birthday parties, with food, drinks, and endless laughter.
items.title: Parc Infantil Recreativo Park - Santa Eularia

items.address: Passeig Joan Carles I, s/n, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears
items.content: Another gem for families and it is one you can barely avoid, because if you go for a drink at Cappuccino or another bar inside of the Marina gates you pass by it. This one boasts fun fairytale play structures, such as a pirate ship, but it also has a zip line and many other structures that keep kids of all ages entertained for hour

This one boasts fun fairytale play structures, such as a pirate ship, but it also has a zip line and many other structures that keep kids of all ages entertained for hour
items.title: Parc Infantil del Passeig Marítim - Marina Botafoch

items.address: Plaza Mestre Terrisser Frigoles. Puig d'en Valls
items.content: This brand-new playground at Plaza del Mestre Terrisser Frígoles in Puig d’en Valls is absolutely fantastic. In the middle of a lovely new area of newly build houses you can feel the community spirit. It is a massive 1,400 square meter park with swings, zip lines, cool glides and even large sport areas.
items.summary: This brand-new playground at Plaza del Mestre Terrisser Frígoles in Puig d’en Valls is absolutely fantastic. In the middle of a lovely new area of newly build houses you can feel the community spirit. It is a massive 1,400 square meter park with swings, zip lines, cool glides and even large sport areas.
items.title: Parque infantil Puig den Valls - Plaza del Mestre
